p: In this regard it is worth mentioning the point of view of Durazzo and Lucarini, [ 7] that well summarized the actual main strategies of research for evaluating antioxidant properties: the evaluation of bioactivities of pure compounds and/or their mixtures; the study of different biologically active compound-rich extracts and how these fractions contribute to the activity of total food extract; the isolation of extractable and non-extractable compounds.
